alert.note: Alert for Saipan; Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 22 at 1:40AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHEN...Until 245 AM CHST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 339 PM UTC, Satellite estimates indicate heavy rain in the advisory area. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Garapan, Dandan, China Town, Tanapag, As Mahetog, Koblerville, San Jose (Tinian Municipality), Chalan Kanoa I, San Antonio, Chalan Kanoa II, Chalan Kanoa III, San Roque, Kagman, Chalan Kanoa IV, Kagman III, Gualo Rai, Afetnas, Chalan Piao, Fananganan and Chalan Laulau. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
